name: Bug Fix
description: Workflow for fixing bugs: reproduce, investigate, fix, verify, and create PR.

reproduce.name: Reproduce Bug
reproduce.description: Understand the bug and create a reliable reproduction case

investigate.name: Investigate
investigate.description: Find root cause by tracing code paths and debugging

write_fix.name: Write Fix
write_fix.description: Implement the fix with minimal changes

add_regression_test.name: Add Regression Test
add_regression_test.description: Write a test that would have caught this bug

verify_fix.name: Verify Fix
verify_fix.description: Run all tests and verify the bug is fixed

commit.name: Commit Changes
commit.description: Commit the fix and regression test with a descriptive message

hitl_cannot_reproduce.name: Cannot Reproduce
hitl_cannot_reproduce.description: Unable to reproduce the bug - need more info

hitl_fix_failed.name: Fix Failed
hitl_fix_failed.description: Unable to fix the bug - needs human help
